Pyrotaur

   "He used to be called Cosmotaur.  His element was and still is the void.  He's heavily armed.  He carries two rocket launchers, two large blasters that can be converted into machine guns, and two energy blades.  He was headed toward the Western Mediteranean Sea.  Do you know of any bases there that would take in someone bent on killing people?"
